alert.note: Alert for Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 7:25PM CST until March 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CST FOR KAUFMAN COUNTY... At 723 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Heath to Crandall to Ferris, moving east at 35 mph. At 718 PM CST, a 66 MPH wind gust was observed in Terrell. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Mabank, Crandall, Combine, Talty, Kemp, Grays Prairie, Cottonwood, New Terrell City Lake, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Elmo, Scurry, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Rosser, Oak Ridge and Ola. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms have a history of producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
